Most of them were probably in the buildings, as you saw some walls destroyed. Many men in your sights seemed to be less than half the height as most of the women, same as you are.

         “I don't believe it!” Babs said in shock. “All the women here! They've grown as big as we have.”

         “If they all have grown, too,” Candace said. “Then would girls everywhere have grown, too?”

         You can't help but wonder just what could happen next. What is going to happen to men everywhere? And are women going to be this big forever?
12322211.title: Crawling Out of the Gym

choices: An athletic woman who was jogging down the park's path.
A middle-age mother with her little child.
A pretty lady who sat right beside you.
You ARE the woman.
Other Choices Here
13.content:
It is a bright and sunny day at the park. You were sitting on a bench in the very middle of the area, thinking they will be no trouble coming. You witness many people coming and going as you let out a big yawn. It seems to be a regular day here. You had no worries.

         While you have a relaxing moment at the park, you are unaware that some distance away, a newly created virus, known as Gr-0w, as escaped a nearby laboratory and is starting to spread; heading your way.

         You still sit back and enjoy this sunny day. You enjoyed the view of the area; surrounding greens, tall trees, and the reflecting lake. You had no idea that the virus as entered the park. Now, the next woman you'll see will be the first woman you will see grow. Now, who is the woman you will see.
13.title: Incoming Big Day at Park

choices: A hooker looking for someone to “get it on” with
A pretty young woman you suddenly have the hots for.
The bartender, who happens to be female.
You're female, and maybe your friends are, too.
Other Choices Here
14.content:
It was a starry night, and you were at a bar outside of town. You and your friends banged your mugs, yelled out “Cheers!” and drank your beers. You all were joking around and talking about how each of your lives were today. It seems like your were having a good night tonight. You believed that there weren't going to be problems.

         Unfortunately, unknown to any of you, a virus known as Gr-0w has escaped the nearby laboratory, and has begun to spread throughout the land, with the very bar you're at in the way.

         While you and the other other guys were jabbering and joking, you had know clue that you are going to witness the rise of women's size. The first female you will see is going to be the first one you will see grow.

         Who is that very female?
14.title: Gulping One Down

choices: At a fast-food restaurant.
In an office Building.
At a Police Station.
Any Other Jobs?
Or maybe you're not working?
15.content:
Okay. Maybe you're not one of the many scientists at that lab. And you may not be at college, at the park, nor at the bar. But you are going to see some growing women here. So where could you be?

         Maybe you're at work.

         You might work at one of these places here, and you will witness one of your co-workers, or even your boss, begin to grow.

So, where are you working?
15.title: At Work Here

choices: You're at home.
You're at the mall.
Other Choices
155.content:
Okay, so you weren't working when the virus broke out. There could be some other places you're at. Let's list a couple places here.

1. You could be at home, sitting back and relaxing. Someone who lives with you could be growing there.

2. You could be at the mall, doing some shopping. There are suppose to be lots of women there, so maybe you could watch a bunch of them grow there.

Or maybe there are some other place you could be.
155.title: Or maybe you're not working?

choices: The entrance door,it was either Veronica or Fiona
The entrance door,it was the Veronica and Fiona
The back door,your step sis ran away from mom to avoid shopping.
1551.content:
Your name is Stephen and your age is 19.You're all alone in your room,doing nothing but laying on your bed,staring at the ceiling and thinking about your life.Now you are in college but here at home because of a semester break.It's quite disappointing how your friends now have girlfriends heck you even your friend,Shaun had a relationship with this Irish girl back when you were 15.What's more disappointing is how easy you could've get a girlfriwnd because your neighbours are hot chicks.

The house on your left is Veronica's.The house on your right is Fiona's.What's more is both of them are hot and still single.Heck you even were best friends with them when the three of you were still children.The three of you are of the same age but when you were still young and still a child,you confessed your love to them amd said you want to marry the both of them when you grow up but as time goes on the three of you grow distant towards each other and don't see each other quite often.

Now back to the story and stop with all those flashbacks,you're still staring at the ceiling with nothing to do,you got up from your bed and proceed with what you do everyday,gaming.Out you go,out of your room and down to the living room.The house is empty and you're all alone because your mom and little step sister were out shopping.Yup step sister.Your dad actually died during the war in the Middle East so your mom felt lonely.It wasn't a financial problem or anything but your mom felt bad for you,losing a dad at such a young age.So,she married a guy named Ron who is quite a nice guy towards your mom,towards you,towards everybody!Even the gaming console was bought by your step dad.Your step sister on the other hand is quite a shy person.She'd always avoid a conversation with you and try to look away from you.

Though there was no incestral feelings or anything,your little sister's body if you'd might say is well-developed for an 18 year old.She was quite a bombshell.She had G-cup breasts and a pretty big butt with long blonde hair that reached to her chest or shoulderblades.Pale white skin and emerald green eyes.But what she lacks is her taste in clothing and height.She would usually wear baggy clothes that would hide away her figure and wear fake glasses.Not to mention,she was exactly 5 feet tall and you're 6 feet tall.Her personality isn't quite bad,she's a bookworm and a gamer like her step brother.But she had a goddes like body but you?You're a scrawny nerd with a stalker-like face(that explains how you got a good observation of your lil sis).She's also shy in school like there was this one time she'd run to you for your help because some boy wanted to confess his love to her.

God I have got to stop thinking about my step sister.I could be labelled as the neighbourhood's number 1 creep.I arrived at the living room,turned on the tv and my PSBOX 5,launched my favourite game,Lord of the Star Wars:Harry Potter and the Seven Masterchiefs The Game.I sat on the couch faced the TV screen and started playing.All of a sudden,you heard a knock and it was....

P.S : I left the appearance for Veronica and Fiona because I gave you guys the option to make your character.

P.S.S : I will start the growth sequence when the main character has interact with the heroines.

choices: uncared location
more ok

1553.title: others

info.brief_description: Women everywhere are growing ill, and growing bigger. Will give 150 GPs for new chapters.
info.description:
A laboratory located in the middle of the USA has been working on a special airborne virus, Gr-0w, for unclassified reasons. However, the virus leaked out into the air, escaped the lab and has begun to spread around the world, infecting everyone living on it. However, it seems to only affect adult female humans. Due to this new virus, though, it causes the women to grow bigger, and bigger.

         This is a second perspective story, where you will witness one of the many women as she/they undergo the growth. However it goes depends on how you write the chapter.

Here are the rules for this interactive:
1. Don't write only one sentence for a chapter. Try to make it five sentences long at least.

2. Giant preschoolers or anyone else young are not allowed. The women have to be 18 years old or older.

3. No giant old ladies, either. I'm not sure if there's many of us who like thinking about seeing huge bags of wrinkles towering over us. If you would wanna add an effect to the virus that make elders grow younger as well as bigger, then that can be allowed.

4. No insta-growth allowed. You can't just type “She grew 100ft tall,” and just leave it at that. Try to be descriptive and have a growing speed set.

5. You can decide on how the virus affects the women. It could make they breasts grow as well as their height, or maybe their butts. They could grow more muscular or more tubby. They could have different schedules of growth; have a woman stop growing and then grow some more later. You could even have some of the women grow more in size than the others. It's all up to you.

6. Let's not end any chapters until they past chapter 10. Also, don't let both choices of a chapter end with an (END). Try to keep the interactive going.

7. Most of the choices made here would identify you as a male. In most of the second chapters, there is a choice you could make to identify yourself as a female. Here, you can make yourself one of the ladies that are growing.

Now that the rules are set, let's get this story started.

EDIT: I decided to do a little rewarding to inspire everyone to do some writing. Now for whoever writes a fresh new chapter, I will give them 150 Gift Points. Hope you'll appreciate it.

(6-18) Wow, it's been a while since anyone has seen this tale.
